item.title: [HTB] Machine: Fuse
item.description:
Fuse

Unable to connect with SMB1 -- no workgroup available

└─$ ldapsearch -H ldap://10.10.10.193 -x -s base namingcontexts

namingContexts: DC=fabricorp,DC=local
